meanings.definition: A type of mattress construction using metal coils for support.
meanings.sent1: The bed had an innerspring that made it comfortable to sleep on.
meanings.sent2: She preferred mattresses with innerspring for better back support.
meanings.sent3: When the innerspring broke, the mattress turned into a lumpy mess.
meanings.sent4: The innerspring in the mattress was like a hidden trampoline waiting to bounce.
meanings.sent5: The innerspring hummed softly as she settled into bed, lulling her to sleep.

meanings.definition: The inner part of a spring mechanism.
meanings.sent1: He carefully examined the innerspring of the clock to fix the ticking sound.
meanings.sent2: The innerspring of the pen was what made it click smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The innerspring of the door handle popped out unexpectedly, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like the innerspring of a clock, always ticking with new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The innerspring of the machine was the key to its flawless operation.
